headline: Democrat Rep. Elissa Slotkin Poses Maskless with Masked Event Attendees, Following Stacey Abrams' Example
author: Wendell HusebÃ¸
sentences:
pic.twitter.com/actF0YFGrz
 Clay Travis (@ClayTravis) February 6, 2022
On Monday, Georgia gubernatorial candidate former Sen. David Perdue (R-GA) slammed Abrams for her hypocrisy, telling Breitbart News, Liberals' thirst for power during this pandemic has caused enormous damage to our kids, while the elite like Stacey continue living their lives.?
Perdue is campaigning against GOP primary candidate Gov.

Endangered House Democrat Elissa Slotkin doing her own Stacey Abrams  pic.twitter.com/FdePpNnYF2
 Jon Levine (@LevineJonathan) February 7, 2022
Slotkin, an embattled Democrat House member struggling to compete against the red wave likely coming in November, was not the only well-known Democrat to create her own rules over the weekend while others abided by a stricter set of rules.

Abrams tweeted the photo, but soon deleted it after taking heat for being hypocritical:
The number of left wing politicians who post photos posing without masks while all the kids around them are wearing masks is stunning.
Another successful Snow Boots on the Ground event in Owosso!? Slotkin tweeted, along with a smiling photo of herself in front of constituents who remained covered by face masks.
What is even worse is that this is a classroom in Brian Kemp's Georgia, not New York or California,? Perdue said in a statement provided exclusively to Breitbart News.
Stacey Abrams, the failed gubernatorial candidate from Georgia, also shared a photo on Friday of herself maskless in a room full of masked schoolchildren.
Endangered Democrat Rep. Elissa Slotkin (D-MI) posed unmasked with masked attendees at a Sunday event, following Stacey Abrams' example from Friday.
Perdue told Breitbart News he intends to release an ad slamming both Abrams and Kemp for the state's masking of schoolchildren.

Sahil Kapur (@sahilkapur) February 7, 2022
This is the Georgia Stacey Abrams wants,? the ad says before attacking Kemp.
National Republican Congressional Committee (NRCC) spokesman Mike Berg ripped Slotkin for being a hypocrite.
Kemp has failed students and parents by allowing liberal school districts to force mask mandates upon them.
Slotkin also praised her selfie skills? and admitted her staff allowed her to post the maskless photo.
My selfie skills also seem to be improving so my team actually let me post this one!? she said.
It's time to empower parents and rein in these power-hungry career politicians.?
Elissa Slotkin supports mask mandates for everyone but herself.
Many Georgia kids are facing this mask nonsense every day.
Brian Kemp (R) and Democrat general candidate Abrams.
She is a complete hypocrite,? Berg said.
It's a disgrace and it needs to end.
Here is Stacey Abrams doing it.
This is child abuse.
